Name: Magical Waifus Academy
About the game: 18+, THIS GAME IS FOR AN ADULT AUDIENCE ONLY. All characters depicted in the game are 18 years old or older. You are an aspiring mage, discovering new realms and dungeons through a magical portal. You accidentally stumble upon a spell that can direct the portal to a realm filled with sexy creatures wanting a bit of fun before they kick your ass back out! Magical Waifu Academy is a vibrant RPG filled with monstergirls and sexual content. In total, there are 26 girls and 14 high resolution scenes for you to 'research'. Don't forget to check the game files for bonus content!
